Introduction
This topic contains general information on entitlement to benefits under 38 U.S.C. 1151, including
basic criteria for entitlement to compensation under 38 U.S.C. 1151
analysis of claims under 38 U.S.C. 1151
determining whether additional disability exists under 38 U.S.C. 1151
, and
definitions of
informed consent
express consent
, and
implied consent
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B - Rating Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B
